EmailTemplate.name: Ignite Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite tickets are going fast - sign up now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don’t forget to sign up for the Coventry and Warwickshire Ignite event!
Due to high demand, tickets are going fast – don’t miss your chance to be there!
Sign up directly on the Eventbrite website using this link:
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-coventry-warwickshire-tickets-12867090815
Choose Ignite!
Ignite! - 29th November - 2-6pm - Sidney Stringer Academy
Your future - Your choice
Reunite with NCS graduates from across the Coventry and Warwickshire area for a day of interactive and fun workshops based around exploring, developing and assessing your next steps in life.
